text: Vot vy byli na blizhayshey storone, a oni - na otdalenneyshey storone, a putniki - nizhe vas. Yesli by vy naznachili srok, to razoshlis' by v yego vremeni, no eto dlya togo, chtoby Allakh reshil delo, kotoroye bylo sversheno, chtoby pogib tot, kto pogib pri polnoy yasnosti, i chtoby zhil tot, kto zhil pri polnoy yasnosti. I poistine, Allakh - slyshashchiy, znayushchiy
